data.title: How to Contest B Long With Guiding Light
data.description: Use this simple, but powerful popflash to contest B Long with. Coordinate with your teammate who can spot Attackers pushing up, or listen for footsteps and find a timing to pop your flash.

data.title: A Site Retake Flash from A Flowers
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Guiding Light for A Site from A Flowers.

data.title: Support Flash from B Link for B Main
data.description: Here's a great flash from B Link for B Main that can be used to briefly delay the Attacker's push through B Main into B Site, or to create opportunities for your teammates to get picks on players pushing up through B Main.
